sentences.english: SVG is an open standard text-style vector graphics description language.
sentences.chinese: SVG是一种开放标准的文本式矢量图形描述语言。

sentences.english: Chapter One is an overview of the subject-object reversible sentence of which predicate is verb-complement structure.
sentences.chinese: 第一章是对述语为动补结构的主宾可逆句式的概述。

sentences.english: SVG is a opening standard of vector graphics describes languages having text attribute.
sentences.chinese: SVG是一种开放标准的文本式矢量图形描述语言。

sentences.english: In this thesis, we introduce a conversation policy description language CPDL.
sentences.chinese: 本文引入会话协议描述语言CPDL。

sentences.english: Construction and design of the machine-independent microarchitecture description language CHMDL are introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍微结构描述语言CHMDL的构造与设计。

sentences.english: CDL is a wide-spreading computer hardware description language.
sentences.chinese: CDL语言是国际上广泛使用的计算机硬件描述语言。

sentences.english: The paper defines a set of CIS-based script description language.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一套自定义的基于CIS的测试脚本描述语言。

sentences.english: A new test case description language CTL is designed and implemented.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种新的测试例描述语言CTL。

sentences.english: Course Objectives, Digital Logic, Hardware Description Languages.
sentences.chinese: 课程目标，数字逻辑，硬件描述语言。

definition: part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
numeral-classifier compound (e.g. 一次、三套、五本 etc)
